name: Mapping
description:

von William / nur in seinem Dataset benutzt
- refresh nicht notwendig - im Dataflow erstellte Tabellen

pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Planner_Code_Mapping = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [Column1 = _t, Column2 = _t, Column3 = _t]),
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  #"Promoted headers";
shared Subinventory_Mapping = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [#"Subinventory Name" = _t, #"Subinventory Group" = _t])
in
  Source;
shared Local_Item_Category = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("i44FAA==", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [#"Item Number" = _t, #"Wavelength Color" = _t, #"Power Group" = _t, #"Measure Production Output" = _t, #"Measure Shipment OTD" = _t, Wavelength = _t, Model = _t, #"Forecast Type" = _t, #"Production Group" = _t, #"Forecast Group" = _t])
in
  Source;
shared GL_Account_Mapping = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("i44FAA==", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [#"GL Account Code" = _t, #"Account Category" = _t, Nature = _t, #"Account Group" = _t])
in
  Source;
shared GL_Department_Mapping = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("i44FAA==", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [#"GL Department Code" = _t, #"Department Product" = _t, #"Department Group" = _t, #"Department Alias" = _t])
in
  Source;
